column10:
1) The team infiltrates Noboru's castle.
2) As they near the main castle keep, Noboru receives a pigeon from his spies.
3) The letter shocks Noboru immensely. Masaru was publicly excecuted.
4) Noboru senses the end approaching and flees to the top of the keep.
5) As the team climbs the keep to assassinate him, Noboru curses his fate.
6) We learn the story of Noboru's betrayal through his words.
7) In the end, the team reaches him and exacts revenge.
The team infiltrates Noboru's castle from two sides. Hayato and Takuma make one team, Yuki and Aiko the other.
EN
column12: Simplified Chinese

column10: Sunpu Castle
column12: 骏府城

column10: That's as far as that wagon will get us. You ready, old man?
column12: 马车只能带到我们这儿了。准备好了吗，老爷子？

column10: Hehe, the excitement is quite rejuvenating. Even Kuma is eager.
column12: 呵呵呵，老夫早已心潮澎湃，仿佛又回到年轻的时候。就连小熊都迫不及待了。

column10: Yes quite. The others should be in position by now.
column12: 的确如此。其他人应该也已经就位了。

column10: Up here, Aiko-san! We're almost there.
column12: 这边，爱子姐！马上就到了。

column9:
Cam to A+Y
both exit the water
column10: Your navigation skills are impressive, Yuki-chan.
column12: 你的寻路本领真了不起，友希小妹。

column10: Now, we have a hard task ahead of us.
column12: 接下来，好戏即将开演。

column10: Lord Noboru is at the heart of his castle.
column12: 昇正在城中心的位置。

column10: It doesn't look like there's an easy way to reach Noboru.
column12: 看来要接近昇也没那么容易。

column10: The best paths are often hidden from view.
column12: 捷径往往隐藏在暗处。

column10: Remember what I told you before. The wells are all connected with each other.
column12: 我之前也和你说过，这些井都是相通的。

column10: So we use the wells to get into the upper castle.
column12: 也就是说，可以通过这些井到达城的上部。

column10: Takuma-san expected the wells to be secured with locks.
column12: 琢磨大师早料到这些井已上锁。

column10: Locks have keys, right.
column12: 有锁就有钥匙。

column10: I can find a key!
column12: 我能找到钥匙！

column10: We should also look for a disguise on the way.
column12: 顺便也给我找件伪装用的衣服。

column10: Very well.
column12: 好了。

column10: Let us meet the others halfway and enter the wells together. After that we will make further plans.
column12: 先在半路和他们会合后一起下井。然后再做进一步打算吧。

column10: Let's meet the others halfway and use the wells together.
column12: 我们就在半路和他们会合后一起进入井里吧。

column10: Now, shall we begin?
column12: 那么，可以开始行动了吗？

column10: Ready, Aiko-san!
column12: 我准备好了，爱子姐！

column10: Ready when you are, Hayato-san.
column12: 老夫已准备就绪，隼人。

column10: Right. Let's finish this.
column12: 好，争取速战速决。

column10: The team enters a shooting range where soldiers are practicing with firearms. If they use their matchlock pistols here, no one will notice.
column12: The team enters a shooting range where soldiers are practicing with firearms. If they use their matchlock pistols here, no one will notice.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Shooting practice, huh.
column12: 在练习打靶么。

column10: Always shooting.
column12: 枪打个不停真讨厌。

column10: The soldiers are training.
column12: 有士兵正在练枪法。

column10: Who made those rifles? Heh, they're so loud, we could shoot their owners and no one would notice!
column12: 这些枪是谁造的？呵，枪声音未免也太大了，就算我们开枪也不会有人发现吧。

column10: Ooh, I get it!
column12: 噢，我明白了！

column10: Yes, we could mask our shots with their own.
column12: 对，可以利用靶场的声音来掩盖我们的枪声。

column10: Hm, not a bad idea.
column12: 嗯，这主意不错。

column10: The team has reunited
column12: The team has reunited

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Well now, it seems we're all present.
column12: 看来大家都到齐了。

column10: Wow, you look different Takuma-sensei!
column12: 哇，我都快认不出你了，琢磨师父！

column10: Believe me, Yuki-chan, I feel more alive than I have in years.
column12: 如你所见，友希姑娘，我这辈子还从来没体会过如此活力充沛的感觉。

column10: You and me both, old man. Noboru won't know what hit him.
column12: 我也一样，老爷子。我要神不知鬼不觉地，让昇死无葬身之地。

column10: The team pokes an ox. The animal kicks out and destroys a statue. A nearby samurai notices this and berates the handler of the ox for this.
column12: The team pokes an ox. The animal kicks out and destroys a statue. A nearby samurai notices this and berates the handler of the ox for this.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: What?!
column12: 什么？！

column10: How could this happen?!
column12: 怎么会发生这种事?

column10: Imbecile!
column12: 蠢货！

column10: Look at what you've done!
column12: 看你干的好事！

column10: How can you be so incompetent!
column12: 一无是处的废物！

column10: Lord Noboru will be displeased!
column12: 昇大人会发火的！

column10: This is outrageous.
column12: 这也太离谱了。

column10: You and your stupid animal!
column12: 都怪你还有你那头蠢牛！

column10: A samurai gives orders in an area where cargo is loaded onto wagons.
column12: A samurai gives orders in an area where cargo is loaded onto wagons.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: These stupid animals.
column12: 这帮畜生真蠢。

column10: Get it done, you hear me?
column12: 赶紧干完，听到没？

column10: No delays. Lord Noboru was clear.
column12: 昇大人有令，不得延误。

column10: Can't you load these wagons faster?
column12: 就不能给我装得快点吗？

column10: We must leave before nightfall.
column12: 必须在天黑前出发。

column10: Move it! We are losing precious time.
column12: 快搬！别浪费时间！

column10: A samurai in black robes oversees the mounting of a cannon. Everytime he leaves, the guards and workers slack off. (looping)
column12: A samurai in black robes oversees the mounting of a cannon. Everytime he leaves, the guards and workers slack off. (looping)

column10: o
column12: o2

column10: He's coming!
column12: 他来了！

column10: To your posts!
column12: 快回岗位！

column10: Everything in order?
column12: 一切正常吧？

column10: Hmm …
He's gone.
column12: 他走了。

column10: Finally.
column12: 终于走了。

column9: suspects the others of slacking off
column10: Hmm, what's going on?
column12: 嗯？在搞什么？

column10: A samurai oversees rifle training.
column12: A samurai oversees rifle training.

column10: o
column12: o2

column10: Load!
column12: 装弹！

column10: Take aim!
column12: 瞄准！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Not fast enough.
column12: 太慢了。

column10: You are not master marksmen yet!
column12: 枪法都还不够准！

column10: Your weapon is part of you!
column12: 要做到人枪合一！

column10: Aim true, for Lord Noboru!
column12: 打得准点！为了昇大人！

column10: Again!
column12: 再来！

column10: Noboru interrupts rifle training. He wishes to see a demonstration.
column12: Noboru interrupts rifle training. He wishes to see a demonstration.

column10: o
column12: o2

column10: Lord Noboru!
column12: 昇大人！

column10: I wish to observe your progress.
column12: 我来视察一下。

column10: Of course, Noboru-sama.
column12: 是，昇大人。

column10: Men! You have heard Lord Noboru!
column12: 士兵们！不要让昇大人失望！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Fire!
column12: 开火！

column10: Hm, very well. Continue.
column12: 嗯，很好。继续吧。

column10: You have heard your lord! Again!
column12: 都听到了吧！再来一次！

column10: As the team enters travels through the secret passage, we see Noboru receiving a letter.
column12: As the team enters travels through the secret passage, we see Noboru receiving a letter.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Excellent. All here.
column12: 很好。大家都进来了。

column10: So far so good.
column12: 目前为止还算顺利。

column9: cam to Noboru, who's talking to a soldier
column10: … very good. See that the men are prepared for my brother's return from Kyoto.
column12: ……很好。全军准备，我兄弟就快从京都返回了。

column10: Yes, Noboru-sama.
column12: 遵命，昇大人。

column10: Lord Noboru!
column12: 昇大人！

column10: Why do you disturb us? Do you bring news of my son?
column12: 没看到我在谈正事吗？怎么，有我儿子消息了吗？

column9: hands over the letter and leaves
column10: A letter came. A message from our spies in Kyoto.
column12: 来信了。是京都的密探发回来的密信。

column9:
reads the letter
brief pause before speaking
column10: … this … how is this possible!
column12: ……这……怎么可能！

column10: Tell the officers to double the guards. No one is to enter the keep.
column12: 传令下去，把守卫人数加倍。任何人都不得进入天守阁。

column10: If anyone tries they are to be killed.
column12: 违者，格杀勿论。

column9: bows and goes to carry out his orders
column10: Understood, Noboru-sama!
column12: 遵命，昇大人！

column10: My son … executed by my own brother. Is Mugen taking vengeance on me?
column12: 我的儿子……竟被我兄长处决了。这是无限在向我复仇吗？

column10: This changes everything.
column12: 这下一切都乱套了。

column10: I must think.
column12: 我得好好想想。

column10: The team discusses how to kill Noboru inside his keep.
column12: The team discusses how to kill Noboru inside his keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Seems to me like the Shogun took his revenge already.
column12: 看来，将军已经开始复仇了。

column10: This complicates matters for us.
column12: 但对我们来说，任务难度又增加了。

column10: He's cowering like spider in a broken web.
column12: 他就像一只蜷缩在破网上的蜘蛛。

column10: He may hide up there, yet he forgets that height is your specialty.
column12: 虽然他躲到了楼顶上，但他显然忘了登高正是你们的拿手好戏。

column10: What about you, old man?
column12: 那你呢，老爷子？

column10: You know me, Hayato-san. I always find my way to assist you.
column12: 你还不了解我么，隼人。我自有办法来协助你们。

column10: The team has entered the courtyard before the castle keep.
column12: The team has entered the courtyard before the castle keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Damn. There must be way up there.
column12: 该死。不过肯定会有办法上去。

column10: So high! How will we get there?
column12: 这么高啊！要怎么上去呢？

column10: We will have to improvise. There must be a way up.
column12: 随机应变吧。一定有路能上去。

column10: The team is starting to ascend the keep.
column12: The team is starting to ascend the keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Nice view.
column12: 景色不错。

column10: It's really high!
column12: 真的好高啊！

column10: Noboru is on the top balcony. Right now he is exposed, but if he learns we are here, we will never reach him. We cannot let anyone raise the alarm!
column12: 昇就站在顶部的外侧走廊上。虽然他目前尚无防备，但如果让他有所察觉，就再也不可能有接近他的机会了。所以绝不能让任何人发出警报！

column10: Right. Be clever. Be fast.
column12: 对。我要更机灵点，更快点。

column10: Hehe, I will watch over your ascent.
column12: 嘿嘿嘿，老夫会掩护你们爬上去的。

column10: Hope Noboru enjoys his final minutes.
column12: 就让他好好享受人生的最后几分钟吧。

column10: The team is spotted while climbing the castle keep. The alarm is raised, Noboru runs to safety and the mission fails
column12: The team is spotted while climbing the castle keep. The alarm is raised, Noboru runs to safety and the mission fails

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Fools! Your carelessness will cost you dearly!
column12: 这帮蠢货！这就是所谓一着不慎满盘皆输吧！

column10: He went inside. Damn. That was our only chance!
column12: 他躲进去了。该死，唯一的机会也没有了！

column10: The team is spotted while climbing the castle keep. The alarm is raised, Noboru runs to safety and the mission fails
column12: The team is spotted while climbing the castle keep. The alarm is raised, Noboru runs to safety and the mission fails

column10: EN
column12: EN

column10: Your technique is magnificent.
column12: 您这招真是太牛逼了。

column10: When cut across the neck, a sound like wailing winter winds is heard, they say.
column12: 人言，刎颈之声如冬风哀号。

column10: I'd always hoped to cut someone like that someday, to hear that sound.
column12: 为闻其声，吾常期某日以此法杀人。

column10: But to have it happen to my own neck is ridiculous.
column12: 岂知反起吾身，荒谬至极。

column10: As the team ascends the castle keep, Noboru reflects on his desicions.
column12: As the team ascends the castle keep, Noboru reflects on his desicions.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ōshiro Mugen. Have I underestimated you?
column12: 尾城无限，是我低估你了吗？

column10: It doesn't matter. The game is lost. My brother will not let me recover.
column12: 也无所谓了。败了就是了败了，兄长不可能让我东山再起的。

column10: No doubt Mugen's assassins are already on their way.
column12: 毫无疑问，无限手下的刺客已经在赶来了。

column10: Yes, they must have been the ones who took my son.
column12: 对了，绑架我儿子的应该就是他们。

column10: I wonder … of all people, would Mugen have understood?
column12: 世人都不理解我，但无限或许可以理解我吧？

column10: Was he not a man of honour, willing to make sacrifices to fulfil his duty?
column12: 他也是个为仁义而活，随时准备为责任献出生命的人，不是吗？

column10: We are all masters of our fate. We choose our duty. I chose a future of conquest, while my brother chose peace.
column12: 我们俩兄弟都是命运的主宰。我们各选其责。我选择了征战，而兄长却选择了和平。

column10: And so, for duty, I ignored family and gathered allies against my own brother.
column12: 所以，为了责任，我抛弃了家人，召集盟友对抗我的亲哥哥。

column10: For duty, I sacrificed Okkoto so I would gain honour and respect.
column12: 为了责任，我牺牲了乙事，以获取荣誉和尊重。

column10: For duty, I killed my own nephew, and for duty I would have become Shogun.
column12: 为了责任，我手刃了自己的侄儿。为了责任，我本将成为将军。

column10: I would have reclaimed our territories in Korea.
column12: 我本将举兵朝鲜，夺回领土。

column10: I would have led our samurai against the Chinese.
column12: 我本将率领武士，对抗中华。

column10: The world would have known our glory. A nation of the finest warriors. An unstoppable force.
column12: 我国本将享誉世界。成为最强战士的家园，成为无法阻挡的力量。

column10: That is the future I saw for our people. That is the duty I chose.
column12: 这才是我看到的未来。这才是我选择的责任。

column10: A samurai is master of his fate. Yet without duty, life has no purpose.
column12: 武士可以决定自身的命运。然而没有了责任，人生就毫无意义。

column10: But now Mugen stands victorious in death. Was it because his duty lay elsewhere, in the end?
column12: 但现在无限虽死犹荣。难道是因为我看错了他的责任吗？

column10: This comes after Monlogue one and will be looped until the player reaches the top of the keep.
column12: This comes after Monlogue one and will be looped until the player reaches the top of the keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Yes, I see.
column12: 啊，我明白了。

column10: Still, it doesn't matter.
column12: 然而，为时已晚。

column10: We all chose our duty.
column12: 我们都各选其责。

column10: We are masters of our own destiny.
column12: 我们都是自己命运的主宰。

column10: And yet I wonder ...
column12: 然而我想知道……

column10: What will be left, in the end …
column12: 最终会留下什么……

column10: Hayato confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.
column12: Hayato confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: You! What loyalty does a mercenary like you owe to the dead?
column12: 是你！你这种佣兵打手，既然雇主已死，为何还要对他效忠？

column10: To the dead? None. To a friend though ... more than enough to finish you.
column12: 雇主？非也，我是替朋友……来取你这条狗命的。

column10: Filthy assassin. You are not worthy of my sight. I'd rather watch the evening sky.
column12: 卑鄙的刺客。都不值得我正眼看你，我宁愿看着夜空。

column10: Filthy assassin.
column12: 卑鄙的刺客。

column10: If I must die, I will do so by my own hand.
column12: 既然难逃一死，我要自己动手。

column10: Yuki confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.
column12: Yuki confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ah! The thief Ōshiro Mugen took pity on. Here to avenge your benefactor?
column12: 啊！是尾城无限看着可怜，收留的那个小偷。你是来为恩人报仇的吗？

column10: He was a friend. You don't leave friends behind. And you don't forget them.
column12: 他是我的朋友。人不能抛弃朋友，也不能忘记朋友。

column10: Killed by a ragged child. Who would have thought. Go ahead. Don't waste my time.
column12: 谁能想到，我会死在捡破烂的小毛孩手里。快动手吧，别浪费我时间。

column10: I will not be killed by a ragged child.
column12: 我绝不会死在捡破烂的小毛孩手里。

column10: If I must die, I will do so by my own hand.
column12: 既然难逃一死，我要自己动手。

column10: Aiko confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.
column12: Aiko confronts Noboru on the balcony of his keep.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Ahh. The whore that warmed Mugen's bed.
column12: 啊。是你，那个给无限暖床的婊子。

column10: A poor choice for last words.
column12: 你这遗言真没品味。

column10: So I shall die at the hands of a woman. Very well. Do what you must.
column12: 我竟然会死在女人手里。也罢，动手吧。

column10: I will not be killed by the hands of a woman.
column12: 我绝不会死在女人手里。

column10: If I must die, I will do so by my own hand.
column12: 既然难逃一死，我要自己动手。

column10: Noboru is killed by the team.
column12: Noboru is killed by the team.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: Oshiro Mugen sends his regards …
column12: 我替尾城无限向你问好……

column10: My name is Yuki. I am not a child.
column12: 我名叫友希，不叫小毛孩。

column10: We all wept for Mugen. No one will weep for you.
column12: 我们都曾为无限哭泣，但没人会为你流泪。

column10: Noboru commits Seppuku.
column12: Noboru commits Seppuku.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: I shall commit Seppuku.
column12: 吾将切腹。

column9: 10 seconds after previous _03a, if nobody kills him
column10: *deathsound*
column12: *死亡音乐*

column10: Good riddance.
column12: 大快人心。

column10: It's over. He's gone.
column12: 一切都结束了，他已经死了。

column10: It was more than you deserved.
column12: 让你切腹算是便宜你了。

column10: Noboru dies. The team leaves the castle and has a final conversation. Then they split up.
column12: Noboru dies. The team leaves the castle and has a final conversation. Then they split up.

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: In the cicada's cry … no sign can foretell … how soon it must die.
column12: 蝉声鸣不已……安有死亡时 。

column9: Takuma starts leaving. cam to balcony, all 3 standing there
column10: It is done.
column12: 都结束了。

column10: What now?
column12: 接下来呢？

column10: We should leave, before anyone starts looking for us.
column12: 在被人发现之前，赶紧离开此地吧。

column9: runs to greet Takuma, who's waiting for them.
column10: Takuma-sensei!
column12: 琢磨师父！

column10: Yuki-chan! Good to see we've all made it out safely.
column12: 友希姑娘！看到大家都安全逃出来，我就放心了。

column10: What is going to happen now?
column12: 接下来怎么办？

column10: That depends. I for one will return to the Shogun.
column12: 看你了。我得回去向将军汇报。

column10: And we're not?
column12: 我们不一起去吗？

column10: I believe the choice is up to you. We did as the Shogun commanded, but we did so because of Mugen.
column12: 你们自己决定。我们虽是遵照将军之命执行任务，但其实是为了无限才做的。

column10: I guess you're right. It won't be the same.
column12: 你说的有理。事态已经变了。

column10: I have come to enjoy our companionship. I would rather say goodbye on my own than see us drawn apart by circumstance.
column12: 这一路走来，我已经把大家当做伙伴。所以，与其等到各式各样不得已的情况将大家强行分开，我宁愿现在先亲口向大家道别。

column10: Now, there is wisdom in that.
column12: 嗯，此话颇有道理。

column10: What about you, Aiko-san? Won't the Shogun be angry with you if we don't come too?
column12: 那你怎么办呢，爱子姐？如果我们不回去的话，将军不会对你发火吗？

column10: Do not fear, Yuki-chan. I still have something to offer him. I hope he will forgive this minor disobedience.
column12: 别害怕，友希妹妹，我还有样东西可以和他做交易。如果他接受，应该不会在意这点小事的。

column10: So … it is farewell then?
column12: 那么……就此别过吧？

column10: The road ahead is long …
column12: 前方路途漫漫……

column10: Why not travel together for a bit, and say goodbye along the way?
column12: 何不再同行一段，在路上道别呢？

column10: Yes! Can we do that, Aiko-san? Please say yes!
column12: 嗯！这样比较好。爱子姐，好不好？

column10: I have no objection. What about you, Hayato-san?
column12: 我不反对。隼人兄意下如何？

column10: Sure. No one else around to keep an eye on you …
column12: 当然可以。再说，现在也没有其他人可以在路上保护你了……

column10: Eh … I think I can make some room in my schedule ...
column12: 呃……我应该能挤出点时间……

column10: Sure. What would you do without me ...
column12: 当然可以，没我你要怎么办……

column10: Teh … alright, why not. Lead the way …
column12: 呵……好吧，有何不可。带路吧……

column10: Alternative for debriefing
column12: Alternative for debriefing

column10: EN
column12: EN2

column10: In the cicada's cry … no sign can foretell … how soon it must die.
column12: 蝉声鸣不已……安有死亡时 。

column9: Takuma starts leaving. cam to balcony, all 3 standing there
column10: It is done.
column12: 都结束了。

column10: What now?
column12: 接下来呢？

column10: We'd better leave, before anyone starts looking for us.
column12: 在被人发现之前，赶紧离开此地吧。

column9: runs to greet Takuma, who's waiting for them.
column10: Takuma-sensei!
column12: 琢磨师父！

column10: Yuki-chan! Good to see we've all made it out safely.
column12: 友希姑娘！看到大家都安全逃出来，我就放心了。

column10: We have fulfilled our duty. Now all that's left is to report back to the Shogun.
column12: 我们的任务就算是完成了。现在就剩回去禀报将军了。

column10: I … don't think I'll be coming.
column12: 我就……不去了。

column10: Huh? … why not? We did what the Shogun wanted, right?
column12: 啊？…为什么？任务已经全部完成了，不是吗？

column10: I didn't do this for the Shogun. I did it for us and … you know.
column12: 我做这些不是为了将军。是为了我自己...以及…...你们懂的。

column10: Don't get me wrong, I have nothing against you all. But from here on …
column12: 别误会，并不是因为讨厌你们。但从今往后……

column10: … it would not be the same. I understand, Hayato-san.
column12: ……已经无法再像以前一样了。我明白，隼人兄。

column10: Then maybe we should follow Hayato's example, Yuki-chan.
column12: 那么，我们也效仿隼人离开吧，友希姑娘。

column10: But … won't the Shogun be looking for us?
column12: 但是……将军大人不会找我们吗？

column9: knows the Shogun will forgive them
column10: Do not fear, Yuki-chan. I will still report to the Shogun. I have an offer to make him. If he accepts it, he might forgive this minor disobedience.
column12: 没关系，友希小妹，我还是会去向将军报告的。而且我还有样东西可以和他做交易，如果他接受，应该不会在意这点小事的。

column10: So … we say goodbye, now?
column12: 所以……我们现在就要分开了？

column10: The road ahead is long …
column12: 前方路途漫漫……

column10: Why not travel together a bit longer, and say goodbye along the way?
column12: 何不再同行一段，在路上道别呢？

column10: Yes! Can we do that, Aiko-san? Please say yes!
column12: 嗯！这样比较好。爱子姐，好不好？

column10: I have no objection. What about you, Hayato-san?
column12: 我不反对。隼人兄意下如何？

column10: Heh … alright. I think I can put up with you for a few more miles ...
column12: 呵……行吧。再忍你们几里路也不是不可以……
